column3: Added a second commit, which further quietens the logging, without losing information.\n
Small and good change ... btw. is our printf thread-safe? At least sometimes I get lines that show no date - time, although -logtimestamps is supplied as switch and others show it twice.\n
@Diapolo don't tell me we need a mutex for printf on windows...\n
@sipa I was just asking with nothing bad in my mind...\n
